EmailTemplate.name: LE-202207-FM-REG-HEV.Phase 7 - Top Target Speakers Register Now
EmailTemplate.subject: Hotel block extended to July 6: Register for Forum 2022 today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Forum The Global Community Advancing Virtual Care
Boston + Virtual | July 20-22, 2022
Now is the time to register for Forum 2022 <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/registration?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=top-target-7&utm_campaign=forum-22]]> in Boston, with preferred pricing at the Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport ending July 6!
Join an impressive roster of speakers and attendees from across the healthcare spectrum. From data scientists exploring how to build meaningful virtual care interactions to expert perspectives on health equity and more—these are the voices shaping the future of virtual care. Be part of the conversation.
FEATURED SPEAKERS
Beth Kreofsky, MBA Operations Manager Mayo Clinic
Judd Hollander, MD Senior Vice President, Healthcare Delivery Innovation Jefferson Health
Sonja Kellen, CEBS, RPA Senior Director of Global Health and Wellness Microsoft Corporation
Keynote session Join this Grammy award-winning composer and conductor—and creator of the Virtual Choir—to explore the power of leadership and technology to foster creativity and connection, even in the most challenging circumstances.
Eric Whitacre Register now
Register now <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/registration?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=top-target-7&utm_campaign=forum-22]]>
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
